name: 陳家祥
objective:
1. 學習並掌握足球基本技術（傳球、停球、帶球、射門、防守、控球）
2. 建立對足球比賽規則與基本戰術的理解與應用能力
3. 提升速度、敏捷、耐力、協調等身體素質
4. 培養運動精神、團隊合作與比賽禮儀

1. Learn and master basic soccer skills (passing, trapping, dribbling, shooting, defending, ball control)
2. Understand and apply soccer rules and basic tactics
3. Improve physical fitness including speed, agility, endurance, and coordination
4. Develop sportsmanship, teamwork, and fair play
schedule:

第 2 週     足球基本知識說明
第 3 週     球感練習、腳內側踢球與停球 (1)
第 4 週     球感練習、腳內側踢球與停球 (2)
第 5 週     傳接球與帶球 (1)
第 6 週     傳接球與帶球 (2)
第 7 週     綜合練習與小組比賽 (1)
第 8 週     綜合練習與小組比賽 (2)
第 9 週     期中考
第 10 週     大腿、胸部停球與控球 (1)
第 11 週     大腿、胸部停球與控球 (2)
第 12 週     腳內側及腳背射門練習 (1)
第 13 週     腳內側及腳背射門練習 (2)
第 14 週     戰術與小組配合練習 (1)	
第 15 週     戰術與小組配合練習 (2)	
第 16 週     模擬比賽
第 17 週     術科測驗
第 18 週     術科測驗與教學評量

Week 1   – Course Introduction
Week 2   – Basic Knowledge of Soccer
Week 3   – Ball Control Practice, Inside Foot Passing and Trapping (1)
Week 4   – Ball Control Practice, Inside Foot Passing and Trapping (2)
Week 5   – Passing and Dribbling (1)
Week 6   – Passing and Dribbling (2)
Week 7   – Integrated Practice and Small-Sided Games (1)
Week 8   – Integrated Practice and Small-Sided Games (2)
Week 9   – Midterm Examination
Week 10 – Thigh and Chest Trapping and Ball Control (1)
Week 11 – Thigh and Chest Trapping and Ball Control (2)
Week 12 – Inside Foot and Instep Shooting Practice (1)
Week 13 – Inside Foot and Instep Shooting Practice (2)
Week 14 – Tactics and Small-Group Cooperation (1)
Week 15 – Tactics and Small-Group Cooperation (2)

scorePolicy:
出席與課堂參與 30%
術科測驗 50%
學習評量 20%

Attendance and Class Participation – 30%
Practical Skill Test – 50%
Learning Assessment – 20%

課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
remarks: 本門課程適合具有下列特質者：1. 喜歡運動流汗、不畏懼運動疲勞。2. 每次上課時，願展現運動活力。3. 願配合任課老師課堂教學。有意願加選本課程者，請針對本身人格特質，對上述三項之要求進行自身描述，並寄信給老師 (寄信不代表一定能加選成功)
